revised_title: Stresses in Built-Up Girders Subjected to Concentrated Loads: Analysis and Experimental Results
tldr: The article presents an analysis of the stresses in built-up girders with elastic connections between flanges and web when subjected to concentrated loads. The author provides a theoretical solution for the stresses and compares it with experimental results, showing that the effect of a flexible connection increases the maximum outer fiber stress due to local stress concentration.
